name: The Last Vagabonds
description:
The Last Vagabonds is a third-person action-adventure in a post-apocalyptic world. Although it's possible to play it alone, you get the most out of it if you play it with a friend. It has a simple loot and crafting system which allows you to weaponize yourself against the undead. Overall it's a short adventure you can finish in one evening.

Combat

You will fight against the zombies with self-crafted melee weapons and bow and arrow.
